title: Phone Breaks
flavorText: Your phone screen just cracked. It still works, but barely.

options.label: Buy a screen protector
options.description: Cheap fix, but it's not great.

options.label: Use it cracked
options.description: Save your money, deal with the annoyance.

options.label: Ask family for help
options.description: They might cover it, but you owe them.

title: New Teacher Notices You
flavorText: Your science teacher pulls you aside and says you have potential.

options.label: Join the after-school program
options.description: Extra work, but a great connection.

options.label: Say thanks, keep your schedule
options.description: Nice to hear, but you're busy.

title: Friend Drama
flavorText: Your two closest friends are fighting and both want you to pick a side.

options.label: Try to mediate
options.description: Play peacemaker. It's stressful but might work.

options.label: Stay out of it
options.description: Not your problem. But they might be upset.

options.label: Pick a side
options.description: You keep one friend happy, lose the other.

title: Bike Trouble
flavorText: Your bike tire is flat and you need to get to school.

options.label: Walk this week
options.description: It works, but eats into your time.

options.label: Ask a friend's parent for rides
options.description: They'll help, but you owe them.

title: Club Invitation
flavorText: The robotics club is looking for new members. The advisor says you'd be great.

options.label: Join the club
options.description: New skills and friends, but it'll take time.

options.label: Pass for now
options.description: Maybe next semester. Keep your time free.
